QUERY_CLOB:
with qry as (select
               case when lower(us.text) like '%nvl%'
                    then 'NVL'
                    when lower(us.text) like '%decode%'
                    then 'CASE'
                    when lower(us.text) like '% goto %'
                    then 'GOTO'
                    when us.text like '%(+)%'
                    then 'ANSI'
                    end as child_code,
               us.type object_type,
               us.name object_name, 
               us.text code, 
               us.line ,
               to_char(rank() over (partition by us.type, us.name, apex_string_util.to_slug(substr(us.text,1,255)) order by us.line)) as unqid
               from v_user_source us
               where us.name not like 'BIN$%'
               and us.name not like 'XXX%'
               and us.type in ('PACKAGE BODY','PACKAGE', 'PROCEDURE', 'FUNCTION')
               ),
     us as (
          select 'COMMIT' child_code,
                 u.object_type, 

                 u.object_name, 
                 'commit' code,
                 u.line,
                 u.signature unqid
          from v_user_statements u
          where u.type = 'COMMIT'
     )
select 
     q.child_code,
     'N' pass_yn, 
     q.object_type, 
     q.object_name, 
     q.line, 
     q.code, 
     q.unqid
from qry q
where q.child_code is not null
union all 
select 
     u.child_code,
     'N' pass_yn, 
     u.object_type, 
     u.object_name, 
     u.line, 
     u.code, 
     u.unqid
from us u
FIX:
*   ANSI : Use ANSI SQL Syntax
*   CASE : Replace with CASE statement
*   COMMIT : Remove commit or at least add an explanatory comment
*   GOTO : Remove GOTO or at least add an explanatory comment
*   NVL : Replace nvl with coalesce
